item.description:
The Rock Circuit is one of the most challenging hike in the Fells.  Although elevation on any trail in the Fells is low this trail goes up and down every rock face in its path.  Total distance is about 4 miles but creative detours (getting lost) may add a bit to distance.  Due to the rocky nature of this trail hiking boots (not running shoes!) are highly recommended.  Don't forget to bring water and a snack.  

The Fells Reservation is a short drive north of Boson just off 93.  At this time of day, if you are coming from Boston you will be going away from the city so traffic will not be bad.  I can carpool and pick people up in the Cambridge, somerville or medford areas.

Here is a general map of the Fells that shows you the location of the Flynn Ice Rick.

http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/metroboston/maps/fells.gif
item.how_to_find_us: I have a dark B;ue car and will be near trail head by 7:45am
item.why: It is Friday the 13th, lets hike!
item.name: Fells Rock Circuit
